Source.Name: drumstick
Source.Summary: Drumstick is a set of MIDI libraries using C++/Qt5 idioms and style.
Source.Description: Drumstick is a set C++ MIDI libraries using Qt5 objects, idioms and style. It contains a C++ wrapper around the ALSA library sequencer interface; ALSA sequencer provides software support for MIDI technology on Linux. A complementary library provides classes for SMF (Standard MIDI files: .MID/.KAR), Cakewalk (.WRK), and Overture (.OVE) file formats processing. A multiplatform realtime MIDI I/O library is also provided since release 1.0.
